prTitle: chore: close duplicate - feature already exists
prBody:
The RecipeCard and RecipeList components requested in issue #71 are already fully implemented and working correctly in the codebase.

## Implemented Components

### RecipeCard Component
- ✅ Displays all required recipe fields (image, title, description, cook time, servings, difficulty, pasta type, region)
- ✅ Implements lazy loading with `loading="lazy"` attribute
- ✅ Includes error handling for broken images with placeholder fallback
- ✅ Fully styled with Tailwind CSS including hover effects and responsive design
- ✅ Links to recipe detail pages via React Router

### RecipeList Component
- ✅ Displays recipes in responsive grid layout (1-4 columns based on screen size)
- ✅ Integrates with RecipeContext for filtered recipe data
- ✅ Shows empty state message "No recipes found" when no recipes match filters
- ✅ Includes recipe count display
- ✅ Properly styled with Tailwind CSS

### Supporting Implementation
- ✅ RecipeContext provides recipe data and filtering functionality
- ✅ Filter helpers implement search and category filtering logic
- ✅ Recipe data loaded from JSON file with 20 complete recipes
- ✅ Build and development servers run without errors

Closes #71
explanation:
The requested functionality for issue #71 (task-pasta-recipes-react-feat-recipe-browsing-2) is already fully implemented with:

- **RecipeCard.jsx**: Complete component displaying recipe image, title, description, cook time, servings, difficulty level, pasta type, and region with proper Tailwind styling, lazy loading, and error handling
- **RecipeList.jsx**: Complete component with responsive grid layout, empty state handling, and integration with RecipeContext
- **RecipeContext.jsx**: Provides recipe data and filtering state management
- **filterHelpers.js**: Implements search and filtering logic
- **recipes.json**: Contains 20 complete recipe objects

All acceptance criteria are met:
- RecipeCard renders all required fields with proper styling ✅
- RecipeList displays recipes in responsive grid layout ✅  
- Empty state message shows when no recipes match filters ✅
- Images lazy-load using native loading attribute ✅

The application builds successfully and all components are functional. No additional implementation is needed.
